overview:
Cindy Kelly has been involved the technology industry since the early 90’s. Her experience has ranged from procurement of electronic components to the design, coding and search engine marketing of websites.

Over the years she has married beautiful design with internet marketing, successfully demonstrating that you don’t have to sacrifice appearance for search engine visibility.

In 2005, she founded the The Web Decorators, a Tampa based web site design company that focuses on developing lead generating websites.

At The Web Decorators our mission is clear. We focus directly on each clientâ€™s desired objective to enhance business image and visibility resulting in increased business opportunities.
